title: Secretar. Founded on the story of the Casket Letters
author: Beatty, W.
snippet: In a word, I decided to return toDalkeith ; once there, I intended to find out Jean, and syne, gifI had the luck to recover the Band, either to turn myself owerto Morton or some other man. Gif I could not find her, as Iettled to do, by means of Bonny, I had still the Port of Leithand France before me.

title: Story of Maurice Lestrange. Being an account of his travels and adventures in Scotland during the year 1765. [A tale.]
author: Omond, George William Thomson.
snippet: In the morning we heard that our trunks hadarrived at the Port of Leith, and Arbuthnot, havingsent a messenger to fetch them, went in search oflodgings, while I, the day being very fine thoughcold, set out to see the town.
